mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOAN_CONS ( PURPOSE, MONEY, PERIOD, INCOME, NAME, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, SEX, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{purpose}, #{money}, #{period}, #{income}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{sex}, 0, 'N', NOW(), #{USERID} )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, PURPOSE, MONEY, PERIOD, INCOME, NAME, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, SEX, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID, (SELECT COUNT(IDX) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE PARENT_IDX = LC.IDX AND DEL_GB = 'N') as SUB_COUNT FROM LOAN_CONS LC WHERE DEL_GB = 'N'

SELECT IDX, PURPOSE, MONEY, PERIOD, INCOME, NAME, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, SEX, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID, (SELECT COUNT(IDX) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE PARENT_IDX = LC.IDX) as SUB_COUNT FROM LOAN_CONS LC WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND CREA_ID = #{USERID}
mapper.update: UPDATE LOAN_CONS SET HIT_CNT = ifnull(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, PURPOSE, MONEY, PERIOD, INCOME, NAME, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, PHONE, SEX, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID FROM LOAN_CONS WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
